name: Exceeded burning rate SLOs
description: The SLOs that currently are burning more error budget that then available

name: All burning rate (Filtered >${min_burning_rate}x)
description: The burning rate of the all the Service SLOs
This moment burning % of the budget.
This month remaining error budget, starts the 1st of the month and ends  28th-31st (not rolling window)
A rolling window of the total period (30d) error budget remaining.

name: Month error budget burn chart
description: This graph shows the month error budget burn down chart (starts the 1st until the end of the month)

queries: max(ALERTS", sloth_slo="$", sloth_severity="ticket"}) OR on() vector(0)
max(ALERTS", sloth_slo="$", sloth_severity="page"}) or on() vector(0)
